item.title: Exercises
item.description: Exercises If you deleted the PV from the previous exercise please recreate it kubectl apply -f mysql-pv.yaml Mysql conf needed for testing kubectl create -f mysql-config.yaml Start the Mysql deployment kubectl apply -f mysql-health.yaml Get the pod name POD_NAME=$(kubectl get pods -l app=mysql -o=jsonpath='{.items[0].metadata.name}') Describe pod should display a healthy pod kubectl describe pod $POD_NAME Breaking the readiness probe kubectl exec $POD_NAME -c mysql -- mv /usr/bin/mysql /usr/bin/mysql.
